name: The Wasteland Trucker
description: The Wasteland Trucker is a Survival/Truck/Life simulator game where your task is to make enough money to survive and expand your wealth in the harsh semi-post apocalyptic lands of Slaveria, doing legal and illegal work, while maintaining, fixing, building, repairing, tuning your trucks, cars and other vehicles. The game focuses on freedom and allows the player to do anything that you can do in real life as well. For example: Working for companies, getting wasted, trading, smuggling illegal substances, scavenging the wasteland, finding abandoned vehicles, buying and customizing, tuning trucks/cars other vehicles.
